TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler(object sender, GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>, or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>.
